title: Creating and Managing User Groups via API
name: user_groups

steps.title: Creating Groups
description:
In ortder to create a group, you will need to use the `user` service, and `add` action.
The key part of creating a group is setting the `type` attribute to `GROUP`, and setting the `id` and `screenName`.

summary: This will walk you through creating, and managing user groups in Kaltura.
